entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: WSW 61 km/h gust 84 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
